snippet: Benedict Morelli said it was not yet clear whether the comedian, injured in a June crash on the New Jersey Turnpike, would fully regain his health.
abstract: Actor Tracy Morgan's lawyer Benedict Morelli says comedian is fighting to recover from severe brain injury suffered in highway crash with Walmart truck and it is uncertain whether he will fully recover; lawyers are in court in New Jersey for a scheduling conference in comedian's lawsuit against Walmart Stores.
lead_paragraph: Benedict Morelli said it was not yet clear whether the comedian, injured in a June crash on the New Jersey Turnpike, would fully regain his health.

headline.main: Tracy Morgan Fighting to Recover From ‘Severe Brain Injury,’ Lawyer Says
headline.print_headline: Comedian Struggling to Recover From Brain Injury After Crash
